Semaine d'ouverture Sustainable and Green Finance
Objectifs du module: - Understand at a glance the stakes, actors and stakeholders involved in sustainable finance - Meet a network of professionals at the forefront of the sector.
Programme du module: The program changes every year. It includes site visits, conference and informal gatherings.
Modalit\u00e9s: Write a general overview of the sector : after the week, your first classes and your own research, write to your boss (a manager of an investment fund) that want to understand what is green finance, what is at stake, what s/he should think about in terms of (i) legislation, (ii) impact of her/his investments.
